i am a civil war reenactment participant.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn more about animals and the environment.
my favorite band is pink floyd.
I love to snuggle with my cats and watch funny videos on YouTube.

participant_2.background:
I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle.
my favorite sport is soccer.
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking! I'm a big fan of Pink Floyd, what's your favorite song by them?
I love so many of their songs, but one of my favorites is Comfortably Numb. What's your favorite book?
I love The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, it's a classic. I also really enjoy reading about animals and the environment.
Oh, I love animals! I have two cats of my own. What kinds of animals do you like?
I love all animals, but I'm especially fond of cats and dogs. I'm also a big fan of reptiles and amphibians.
Me too! I have a friend who has a snake and I love to watch it. Do you do anything fun with your cats?
I love to snuggle with them and watch funny videos on YouTube. I also like to play with them, but they're not very good at playing fetch.
Haha, I know what you mean. My cats are the same way. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to cook and bake, and I'm a civil war reenactment participant. I also love to read and spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read and spend time with my family and friends too. I also enjoy cosplaying with my husband.
That's awesome! I've never been to a cosplay event, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to meet new people and have fun.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do! I'm glad we met.
